resources.string:
1 - Sing to tone:
 Choose the scale and try to sing at exact the same tone as randomly picked note. After 5 seconds your performance will be shown.
 2 - Tones:
 In this module you can freely practice singing and recognizing tones without being judged. Simply touch the desired tone and sing.
 3 - Guessing:
 Choose two scales and try to guess which random tones were played.
